physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Liver enlarged three fingerbreadths; generalized lymphadenopathy; pigmentation of the skin; liver profile indicated some dysfunction; x-rays of long bones revealed thinning of the cortex and rarefaction of the medullary portions; both femurs showed evidence of previous pathology.
Patient rarely showed muscular response to ECT; only mild twitching of the lower legs after electro-shock treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After 22 treatments, marked improvement was noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient was in excellent condition upon being given leave from the hospital.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement noted from admission through to discharge.
